channel.title: Changing whta NPC's hit... My NPC's keep hitting 0s forever
channel.description:
Ok so I the NPC's I got on my server keep hitting 0s... I there a way to change that? I know in NPC file it only has lvl and hp but not what they hit or antything like that.
Please help
I got Jad and he is hitting 0s

item.title: Changing whta NPC's hit... My NPC's keep hitting 0s forever
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Add this in Npchandler.java

} if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == NPCID) { hitDiff = lowesthit + misc.random(maxhit);

Replace the NPCID, lowesthit, and maxhit with what you want that NPC to hit.

Read full topic
item.source: Changing whta NPC's hit... My NPC's keep hitting 0s forever

item.title: Changing whta NPC's hit... My NPC's keep hitting 0s forever
item.dc:creator: @OWNER_2007 OWNER 2007
item.description:
@OWNER_2007 wrote:

NPC health and combat level affect what they hit in private servers.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing whta NPC's hit... My NPC's keep hitting 0s forever

item.description:
@elitescouter wrote:

I made the max hit on the npc hp / 10 but they are still hitting 0s even with no armor… What is wrong can any1 point me in the right direction?
